project_descr: A Joint UNCT for Human Rights Protection and Promotion in the Republic of Moldova

outputs.output_title: Rule of Law and Human Rights
outputs.output_descr: To strengthen rule of law and human rights protection in the Republic of Moldova in-line with international human rights standards, Justice Sector Reform Strategy (2011 – 2016) and its Action Plan

The project will consolidate and support the efforts to strengthen human rights in Moldova. The final target of the project is to mainstream human rights in policy formulation and implementation; to consolidate the capacities of state and non-state actors in the area of human rights The project will (i) support the efforts of the national authorities to strengthen the national system for human rights promotion and protection; (ii) strengthen communication on and raise awareness of human rights at national level; (iii) assist line Ministries in adjusting legislation and practices in line with the UN human rights law.

document_name: Efforts to Strengthen Human Rights Justice, Enforcement and the Inclusion of Vulnerable Persons and Groups
